Package game

Class Fireworks.AnimatedLine

java.lang.Object
game.Fireworks.AnimatedLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
Fireworks
public class Fireworks.AnimatedLine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Draws an animated line segment that appears to move or to lengthen over time.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AnimatedLine​(int xStart, int yStart, int length, double theta, int step, java.awt.Color color, boolean burst)
    Constructs an animated line that begins at (xStart,yStart) and continues until it reaches "length" in length.
    AnimatedLine​(int xStart, int yStart, int xEnd, int yEnd, int step, java.awt.Color color, boolean burst)
    Constructs an animated line that begins at (xStart,yStart) and moves to (xEnd,yEnd) in increments of step size.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void run()
    Animates the line by drawing and erasing segments every 100 milliseconds.
    java.lang.Thread start()
    Starts the animation.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimatedLine

      public AnimatedLine​(int xStart, int yStart, int xEnd, int yEnd, int step, java.awt.Color color, boolean burst)
      Constructs an animated line that begins at (xStart,yStart) and moves to (xEnd,yEnd) in increments of step size.
      Parameters:
      xStart - The X-coordinate of the start of the line segment.
      yStart - The Y-coordinate of the start of the line segment.
      xEnd - The X-coordinate of the end of the line segment.
      yEnd - The Y-coordinate of the end of the line segment.
      step - The animation step size; how much the line grows by.
      color - The color of the line.
      burst - The line is a star burst (true) or ascending firework (false). Star burst lines reach their full length before they are erased; ascending fireworks are drawn and erased so that they appear to by shooting upwards.

    • AnimatedLine

      public AnimatedLine​(int xStart, int yStart, int length, double theta, int step, java.awt.Color color, boolean burst)
      Constructs an animated line that begins at (xStart,yStart) and continues until it reaches "length" in length.
      Parameters:
      xStart - The X-coordinate of the start of the line segment.
      yStart - The Y-coordinate of the start of the line segment.
      length - The total length of the line.
      theta - The angle, measured from the horizontal, at which the line is drawn
      step - The animation step size; how much the line grows by.
      color - The color of the line.
      burst - The line is a star burst (true) or ascending firework (false). Star burst lines reach their full length before they are erased; ascending fireworks are drawn and erased so that they appear to by shooting upwards.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public java.lang.Thread start()
      Starts the animation.

    • run

      public void run()
      Animates the line by drawing and erasing segments every 100 milliseconds.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
